article_title: Year-End Tax Tips Every Entrepreneur Needs To Know -- Before They Expire

article_metadata.description: As 2013 comes to an end, successful entrepreneurs and other taxpayers should take note that many tax deductions and tax credits are being reduced or altogether expired on January 1st, 2014. This Infographic summarizes some of the major 2014 tax changes.
article_metadata.author: Holly Magister
